sqlMap.select: SELECT r.ROLE_ID, r.ROLE_CODE, r.ROLE_NAME, r.ROLE_PID, r.ROLE_DESC, r.ROLE_STATE, r.ROLE_SORT, u.USER_ID, u.USER_CODE, u.USER_NAME, u.USER_PWD, u.USER_SEX, u.USER_DESC, u.USER_STATE, u.USER_SORT FROM security_role r Inner Join security_user_role_rel rel ON r.ROLE_ID = rel.ROLE_ID Inner Join security_user u on rel.USER_ID = u.USER_ID where 1=1 and r.ROLE_ID = #roleId# order by u.USER_CODE,u.USER_NAME

SELECT r.ROLE_ID, r.ROLE_CODE, r.ROLE_NAME, r.ROLE_PID, r.ROLE_DESC, r.ROLE_STATE, r.ROLE_SORT, u.USER_ID, u.USER_CODE, u.USER_NAME, u.USER_PWD, u.USER_SEX, u.USER_DESC, u.USER_STATE, u.USER_SORT FROM security_role r Inner Join security_user_role_rel rel ON r.ROLE_ID = rel.ROLE_ID Inner Join security_user u on rel.USER_ID = u.USER_ID where 1=1 and r.ROLE_ID = #roleId# and R.ROLE_ID=#ROLE_ID# and U.USER_ID=#USER_ID#
sqlMap.delete: delete from security_user_role_rel where ROLE_ID = #roleId# and USER_ID = #userId#
